#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;

int main(){
	int n;
	string number;

	cin >> n;
	for (int k = 0; k < n; k++){
		bool yes = true;
		cin >> number;
		for (unsigned int i = 0; i < number.length(); i++){
			switch (number[i]){
				case '0':
				case '8':
				case '1': break;

				case '6': number[i] = '9'; break;
				case '9': number[i] = '6'; break;

				case '2':
				case '3':
				case '4':
				case '5':
				case '7': yes = false;
			}
			if (!yes){ break; }
		}

		if (yes){
			cout << "yes" << endl;
			for (int i = number.length() - 1; i >= 0; i--){
				cout << number[i];
			}
			cout << endl;
		}
		else{
			cout << "no" << endl;
		}
	}

	return 0;
}
